stimulusHtml: The roles of proteins in membrane structure and transport of molecules across the membrane

features.html:
Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin.

Proteins–large complex molecules–are major building blocks of all living organisms. Discuss the following in relation to proteins.
